name.value: MP9 - Server - Scenario 3.x - Receive MedicationData - JSON Format

description.value: Scenario 3.x - Receive MedicationData for J. de XXX_Luzac.
Date that data and queries are expected to be relative to.
Specifies the query that runs and general checks on the response.
Test server to handle a Bundle of type transaction.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is transaction-response.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that literal References (Reference.reference) are an absolute URL, a relative URL or an internal fragment reference (contained), see: http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/references.html#literal.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this as Reference).reference.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or startsWith('#') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') or (startsWith('urn:').not() and startsWith('#').not() and matches('^[A-Za-z]{3,}/[^/]+$')) )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 16 MedicationRequest resource(s).
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 7 Medication resource(s).
Checks if all resources specified by the scenario can be identified unambiguously.

Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 MedicationRequest resource(s) that reference(s) Medication with coding '49484|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' (Acetylsalicylzuur tabletmsr 100mg) and contain(s) no ext-StopType and contain(s) no .reasonCode

Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 MedicationRequest resource(s) that reference(s) Medication with coding '49484|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' (Acetylsalicylzuur tabletmsr 100mg) and contain(s) ext-StopType with coding '410546004|http://snomed.info/sct' (stopgezet) and contain(s) .reasonCode with coding '79899007|http://snomed.info/sct' (geneesmiddelinteractie)

expression.value: Bundle.entry.select(resource as MedicationRequest).where(medication.resolve().code.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' and code = '49484')).where(modifierExtension.where(url = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-StopType').value.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '410546004')).where(reasonCode.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '79899007')).count() = 1

description.value: Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 MedicationRequest resource(s) that reference(s) Medication with coding '5967|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' (FUROSEMIDE 40MG TABLET) and contain(s) no ext-StopType and contain(s) no .reasonCode

Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 MedicationRequest resource(s) that reference(s) Medication with coding '5967|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' (FUROSEMIDE 40MG TABLET) and contain(s) no ext-StopType and contain(s) .reasonCode with coding '58848006|http://snomed.info/sct' (gebrek aan geneesmiddeleffect)

expression.value: Bundle.entry.select(resource as MedicationRequest).where(medication.resolve().code.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' and code = '5967')).where(modifierExtension.where(url = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-StopType').exists().not()).where(reasonCode.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '58848006')).count() = 1

description.value: Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 MedicationRequest resource(s) that reference(s) Medication with coding '5967|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' (FUROSEMIDE 40MG TABLET) and contain(s) ext-StopType with coding '410546004|http://snomed.info/sct' (stopgezet) and contain(s) no .reasonCode

expression.value: Bundle.entry.select(resource as MedicationRequest).where(medication.resolve().code.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' and code = '5967')).where(modifierExtension.where(url = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-StopType').value.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '410546004')).where(reasonCode.exists().not()).count() = 1
